Now, the function compute_third(K):

FUNCTION compute_third(K) RESULT(res)

  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: K

  INTEGER :: res, temp_K, ans, remainder

  ! Check if K is even or divisible by5

  if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then

     res = -1

     return

  end if

  temp_K = K

  ! Check if divisible by7

  if (mod(temp_K,7) ==0) then

     temp_K = temp_K /7

  end if

  temp_K = temp_K *9

  ! Now compute ans

  ans =1

  remainder = mod(10, temp_K)

  do while (remainder /=1)

     ans = ans +1

     remainder = mod(remainder *10, temp_K)

  end do

  res = ans

END FUNCTION compute_third

children.text:
The program structure:

program main

  implicit none

  integer :: n, count, B, result

  ! Read input

  read*, n

  ! Compute count of 1's in binary of n

  count =0

  integer :: temp = n

  do while (temp >0) count = count + mod(temp,2)

     temp = temp /2

  end do

  ! Compute B

  if (count ==1) then

     B =0

  else

     B =1

  end if

  ! Compute third step's result

  result = compute_third(B)

  !
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
Output the result

  print*, result

contains

  FUNCTION compute_third(K) RESULT(res)

    INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: K

    INTEGER :: res, temp_K, ans, remainder

    ! Check if K is even or divisible by5

    if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then

       res = -1

       return

    end if

    temp_K = K

    ! Check if divisible by7

    if (mod(temp_K,7) ==0) then

       temp_K = temp_K /7

    end if

    temp_K = temp_K *9

    ! Now compute ans

    ans =1

    remainder = mod(10, temp_K)

    do while (remainder /=1)

       ans = ans +1

       remainder = mod(remainder *10, temp_K)

    end do

    res = ans

  END FUNCTION compute_third

end program main

Now, the function compute_third(K):

FUNCTION compute_third(K) RESULT(res)

  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: K

  INTEGER :: res, temp_K, ans, remainder

  ! Check if K is even or divisible by5

  if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then

     res = -1

     return

  end if

  temp_K = K

  ! Check if divisible by7

  if (mod(temp_K,7) ==0) then

     temp_K = temp_K /7

  end if

  temp_K = temp_K *9

  ! Now compute ans

  ans =1

  remainder = mod(10, temp_K)

  do while (remainder /=1)

     ans = ans +1

     remainder = mod(remainder *10, temp_K)

  end do

  res = ans

END FUNCTION compute_third

Putting all together in a Fortran program.

The program structure:

program main

  implicit none

  integer :: n, count, B, result

  ! Read input

  read*, n

  ! Compute count of 1's in binary of n

  count =0

  integer :: temp = n

  do while (temp >0)

     count = count + mod(temp,2)

     temp = temp /2

  end do

  ! Compute B

  if (count ==1) then

     B =0

  else

     B =1

  end if

  ! Compute third step's result

  result = compute_third(B)

  ! Output the result

  print*, result

contains

  FUNCTION compute_third(K) RESULT(res)

    INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: K

    INTEGER :: res, temp_K, ans, remainder

    ! Check if K is even or divisible by5

    if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then

       res = -1

       return

    end if

    temp_K = K

    ! Check if divisible by7

    if (mod(temp_K,7) ==0) then

       temp_K = temp_K /7

    end if

    temp_K = temp_K *9

    ! Now compute ans

    ans =1

    remainder = mod(10, temp_K)

    do while (remainder /=1)

       ans = ans +1

       remainder = mod(remainder *10, temp_K)

    end do

    res = ans

  END FUNCTION compute_third

end program main
